intro: Eurya crassilimba, commonly known as the broad-leaved eurya, is a species of flowering plant in the family Ericaceae. It is native to Southeast Asia, particularly found in countries like India, China, and Thailand. The plant typically grows as an evergreen shrub, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its leaves are elliptical,革质 (leathery), and have a glossy surface, while its small white flowers appear in clusters. The fruit is a small, dark red drupe that contains a single seed.
